post.body: Fred Thompson has a bit role in Die Hard 2. Epic lulz.
"A medium double chocolaty chip frappuccino"
"You have been weather advised."
I now own a sweater. That is all.
... And now I'm in Phoenix. Frigging awesome.
Rainy in Vegas. Ugh.
#autobailout If you're not watching C-Span 2, you need to turn on the TV immediately.
#autobailout It's over. The bailout is toast.
#autobailout Still no vote. CSpan estimates the House debate will wrap up around 8 PM.
#autobailout Reid said he expects the final bailout legislation to be released at 12:30 PM. The senate, though, will not vote until this ...
#autobailout C-Span reports Reid expects the $15 billion bailout package to come to the floor either today or tomorrow.
#autobailout House convened, named a post office in Albany, Georgia, and recessed at 11:08 a.m.
Ohio University's alumni association owns ouohyeah.com
Krendl got the Otterbein job.
#autobailout My prediction: Congress floats automakers about half of what they asked for and waits for the 111th Congress to settle things.
#autobailout Sen. Casey wants monthly benchmarks for auto companies. How brave.
#autobailout Sen. Corker is ripping into the UAW, Chrysler and GM. And overall this hearing isn't going well for Detroit.
#autobailout Short testimony from Detriot Three CEOs contained few quotes and nothing new ...
#autobailout Sen. Brown on the plane debacle: "We didn't ask the CEOs of the banks to drive to town in Wells Fargo armored trucks."
#autobailout Sen. Dodd backs the plan in a lengthy, boring statement. Yawn.
